Name: Caf√© Louis-Davids
Review Text: Sadly the service was very poor. We had to wait a long time before we could even order. They didn't have our reservation either. The food was good though. The food is sourced from the restaurants next door so you could decide to skip the long wait for service altogether. The outside seating was nice and did create a cosy atmosphere.
